title: Akhil Akkineni-Shriya Bhupal wedding called off? : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
Akhil Akkineni-Shriya Bhupal wedding called off? Actor Akhil Akkineni's wedding to girlfriend Shriya Bhupal has been called off, say reports. IndiaToday.in | Written by Srivatsan A + A - Akhil Akkineni and Shriya Bhupal 
Akhil Akkineni got engaged to Shriya Bhupal in December last year after years of courtship. The couple was all set for a grand wedding ceremony in Italy in May this year. 
However, according to reports, both the families called off the wedding due to reasons unknown. 
A source was quoted by The New Indian Express as saying, "Messages went out last Saturday to guests to cancel their programme. No reason was given. Those who were about to book tickets were advised not to go ahead. Even the tickets booked by both families have been cancelled." 
Shriya is a fashion designer based in Hyderabad and the granddaughter of business tycoon GVK Reddy. Reportedly, the couple fell in a love a few years ago, but only involved their families last year. 
In January, actors Naga Chaitanya and Samantha got engaged after years of courtship. While there aren't any confirmation regarding their marriage, Naga Chaitanya went on the record saying that the marriage is likely to happen this year. 
On the work front, Akhil will be next seen in Vikram Kumar's next, who has previously worked with Nagarjuna in the Telugu film Manam.
